synopsis.text: In the world of basketball, Subaru Hasegawa had dreams of becoming a legendary player. However, his aspirations are abruptly halted when his high school basketball team is disbanded due to allegations against the captain. With his dreams shattered, Subaru resigns himself to a life without basketball. But destiny has other plans for him. His aunt, Mihoshi Takamura, presents him with an unexpected opportunity to coach a girls' basketball team at an elementary school. Initially hesitant to train young girls, Subaru soon learns of their challenging circumstances and decides to dedicate himself to their growth. Together with the spirited sixth-graders Tomoka Minato, Maho Misawa, Airi Kashii, Hinata Hakamada, and Saki Nagatsuki, Subaru embarks on a journey to shape these young girls into formidable players, aiming to conquer every challenge that comes their way. Ro-Kyu-Bu! captures the heartwarming tale of a once-aspiring player turned coach, guiding his team of eager elementary school girls to basketball glory.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
